name: MPPlayableContentManager
desc: A shared content manager used to control interactions between your media app and system-provided or external media player interfaces.

items.name: var dataSource: MPPlayableContentDataSource?
items.desc: The data source provided by the app.

items.name: protocol MPPlayableContentDataSource
items.desc: The data source providing media metadata to external media players so they can build user interfaces displaying your app’s content.

items.name: var delegate: MPPlayableContentDelegate?
items.desc: A delegate that lets the media player manage the app’s playback queue.

items.name: protocol MPPlayableContentDelegate
items.desc: The protocol used to let external media players send playback commands to an app.

items.name: class func shared() -> Self
items.desc: Returns the current content manager instance.

items.name: func beginUpdates()
items.desc: Updates several Media Player content items at once.

items.name: func reloadData()
items.desc: Reloads the data from the data source.

items.name: var context: MPPlayableContentManagerContext
items.desc: The current state of the playable content endpoint.

items.name: var nowPlayingIdentifiers: [String]
items.desc: The content items currently playing based on their identifiers.
